title: Aerial Vision-and-Dialog Navigation. (arXiv:2205.12219v3 [cs.CV] UPDATED)
abstract: The ability to converse with humans and follow natural language commands is crucial for intelligent unmanned aerial vehicles (a.k.a. drones). It can relieve people's burden of holding a controller all the time, allow multitasking, and make drone control more accessible for people with disabilities or with their hands occupied. To this end, we introduce Aerial Vision-and-Dialog Navigation (AVDN), to navigate a drone via natural language conversation. We build a drone simulator with a continuous photorealistic environment and collect a new AVDN dataset of over 3k recorded navigation trajectories with asynchronous human-human dialogs between commanders and followers. The commander provides initial navigation instruction and further guidance by request, while the follower navigates the drone in the simulator and asks questions when needed. translated_title: 空中对话与导航：一种基于自然语言的无人机导航方法
translated_abstract: 能够与人类进行对话并遵循自然语言指令是智能无人机（即无人机）的关键能力。它可以减轻人们一直握着控制器的负担，允许同时进行多项任务，使残疾人或手部占用者更容易控制无人机。为此，我们介绍了一种名为Aerial Vision-and-Dialog Navigation（AVDN）的无人机导航方法，通过自然语言对话来控制无人机的导航。我们构建了一个带有连续逼真环境的无人机模拟器，并收集了一组新的AVDN数据集，其中包括超过3,000个记录的导航轨迹以及指挥官和跟随者之间的异步人际对话。指挥官提供初始导航指令，并根据需要提供进一步的指导，而跟随者在模拟器中导航无人机并在需要时提问。在数据收集过程中，跟随者对无人机的视觉观察也被记录下来。基于AVDN数据集，我们研究了无人机导航的任务。
tldr: 本文介绍了一种名为AVDN的无人机导航方法，该方法通过自然语言对话来控制无人机的导航，为解决无人机控制的人体负担、多任务操作、以及残疾人和手部占用者控制无人机的难题提供了新思路。
en_tdlr: This paper introduces a drone navigation method called AVDN, which controls the navigation of the drone through natural language conversation, providing a new solution to the problems of human burden, multitasking, and the difficulty of controlling the drone by disabled people and those with hand occupation.
